summary: The VA has been working to address opioid safety for veterans and has made progress in reducing opioid prescriptions. For example, VA has started a program to educate providers on best practices related to pain management and the optimal use of opioids. However, we found that VA has not fully met all of its opioid safety goals. Its health care providers also are not consistently...
title: VA Health Care: Progress Made Towards Improving Opioid Safety, but Further Efforts to Assess Progress and Reduce Risk Are Needed
